com.samczsun.skype4j.chat

Interface GroupChat

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Chat

    public interface GroupChat
extends Chat
    Represents a group chat with one or more people

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getTopic

        String getTopic()
        Get the topic of the chat.
        Returns:
        The topic of this chat
        Throws:
        NotLoadedException - If the chat is not yet loaded

      • setTopic

        void setTopic(String topic)
       throws ConnectionException
        Set the topic of the chat. This will occur in real time
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
        NotLoadedException - If the chat is not yet loaded

      • getPicture

        BufferedImage getPicture()
                  throws ConnectionException
        Get the current picture of the chat. The result will be cached unless the picture is updated
        Returns:
        The current picture
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while fetching the picture.

      • setImage

        void setImage(BufferedImage image,
              String imageType)
       throws ConnectionException,
              IOException
        Set the image for this chat. This will occur in real time WARNING: This endpoint is not officially supported by Skype. As such, it may or may not be functional in the future
        Parameters:
        image - The image to upload
        imageType - The type of image (png, jpg, etc)
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
        IOException - If an error occurs while converting the image to bytes

      • setImage

        void setImage(File file)
       throws ConnectionException,
              IOException
        Set the image for this chat. This will occur in real time WARNING: This endpoint is not officially supported by Skype. As such, it may or may not be functional in the future
        Parameters:
        file - The image to upload
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
        IOException - If an error occurs while converting the image to bytes

      • isOptionEnabled

        boolean isOptionEnabled(OptionUpdateEvent.Option option)
        Get whether an option is enabled.
        Parameters:
        option - The option to query
        Returns:
        Whether the option is enabled
        Throws:
        NotLoadedException - If the chat is not yet loaded

      • setOptionEnabled

        void setOptionEnabled(OptionUpdateEvent.Option option,
                      boolean enabled)
               throws ConnectionException
        Set whether an option is enabled. If the option is already enabled and a request to enable it is sent or vice versa, it will be silently ignored
        Parameters:
        option - The option to set
        enabled - Whether to enable it or not
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
        NotLoadedException - If the chat is not yet loaded

        Parameters:
        contact - The contact to add
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint

      • kick

        void kick(String username)
   throws ConnectionException
        Kick a user from this chat. This will occur in real time.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user to kick
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
        NotLoadedException - If the chat is not yet loaded

      • leave

        void leave()
    throws ConnectionException
        Leave the chat. This will occur in real time.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
        NotLoadedException - If the chat is not yet loaded

      • getJoinUrl

        String getJoinUrl()
           throws ConnectionException
        Gets the join url for people to join.
        Returns:
        The join url
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
        NotLoadedException - If the chat is not yet loaded
        IllegalStateException - If joining is not enabled

        Parameters:
